display_long_description:
Turn your home into an ancient Roman arena. Grab your sword and shield, block deadly strikes, and counterattack with precision as enemies pour in wave after wave.

⚔️ Epic Sword Combat – Battle legendary warriors with realistic swings, blocks, and full-body movement.
[media]

👊 Upgrade Between Battles – After each wave, choose powerful upgrades: stronger swords, reinforced shields, or special combat perks to stay in the fight longer.
[media]

🏛️ Mixed Reality Immersion – Your real-world space becomes the arena as portals bring enemies directly into your environment.
[media]

🗡️ Unlock Iconic Weapons – Wield historic blades like the Gladius, Sica, and Falcata as you progress.
[media]

💪 Physical Challenge – Swing, dodge, and defend in a true room-scale MR experience that keeps you on your feet.

🏆 Prove Your Strength – Push your limits, rack up high scores, and survive as the ultimate gladiator.
